scripts.start: npm run build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-js" "netlify dev --port=8888"
scripts.copy: mkdir -p public && cp src/index.html src/_redirects src/_headers public/ && mkdir -p public/.well-known && cp src/.well-known/* public/.well-known
scripts.build: npm run copy && npm run build-js && npm run build-sass
scripts.build-js: browserify -p esmify -t envify -t uglifyify --debug src/index.js > public/bundle.js
scripts.watch-js: watchify -p esmify -t envify -t uglifyify --debug src/index.js -o public/bundle.js
scripts.test-cypress: NODE_ENV=test env $(cat .env | xargs) concurrently --kill-others "npm start" "cypress open"
